user_query: I'm starting a new fitness routine and need guidance on my diet. Can you provide me with the nutritional analysis for a high-protein meal plan? Additionally, I'm curious to know the ideal weight for someone who is 185 cm tall.

TaskList.description: Gather information about high-protein meal options including nutritional content.
Calculate the ideal weight based on height (185 cm).
Compile a comprehensive high-protein meal plan based on the gathered information.
Provide the nutritional analysis for the compiled high-protein meal plan.
